alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 1:59PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of DeSoto and southeastern Shelby Counties through 230 PM CST... At 158 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Midtown Memphis to Eudora. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Southaven, Collierville, Germantown, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Hernando, T O Fuller State Park, Cordova, Memphis, Walls, Lake Cormorant, Southwest Memphis, Lynchburg, Eudora, Southeast Memphis, Downtown Memphis, Whitehaven, Frayser and Midtown Memphis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for eastern Arkansas...northwestern Mississippi...and western Tennessee.
